Package fr.ensibs.userService

Class ManageUsersServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.ensibs.userService.ManageUsersServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ManageUsersService
    public class ManageUsersServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ManageUsersService
    Manage all the users. Each user can sign up, sign in and sign out. But only the administrator can delete a customer and get customer by its id
    Author:
    Nadjim ABASY and Robin ASPE

      • getTokenPermission

        public Person.PERMISSION getTokenPermission​(java.lang.String token)
                                     throws InvalidTokenException
        Method to get the permission equivalent of a token. SECURICY ALERT: CAN BE USED TO TEST BRUTE-FORCE CREATED TOKENS
        Specified by:
        getTokenPermission in interface ManageUsersService

        Returns:

        InvalidTokenException - if token given is empty
